column2: # Set seed for any radom calculations
set.seed(100)
# get the number of stations with a number of years >= some specified number
# define number of years to be a threshold
tmp_nmbstns <- sapply(
tmp_thrsh,
function(x) {sum(dt_annWY[, length(yr), by = site_no]$V1 >= x)}
paste0("Number of stations with more than ",
tmp_thrsh,
" years represented: ",
tmp_nmbstns,
"Number of stations with more than 1 years represented: 5437\n"
"Number of stations with more than 2 years represented: 5436\n"
"Number of stations with more than 3 years represented: 5434\n"
"Number of stations with more than 6 years represented: 5402\n"
"Number of stations with more than 10 years represented: 5154\n"
"Number of stations with more than 15 years represented: 4501\n"
"Number of stations with more than 20 years represented: 3770\n"
"Number of stations with more than 30 years represented: 2862\n"
"Number of stations with more than 37 years represented: 2240\n"
data_in <- data.frame(Thresh = tmp_thrsh, N_Stations = tmp_nmbstns)
p <- ggplot2::ggplot(data = data_in) +
geom_point(aes(x = as.factor(Thresh), y = N_Stations)) +
xlab("Number of consecutive years") + ylab("number of stations with at least
the threshold number of continuous years")
#ggiraph::girafe(ggobj = p)
plot(p)
